name: Empress Hotel IMS Ho Chi Minh

reviews.text: I stayed at the Empress for one night after a long flight! I arrived late at night and was greeted by name as I walked through the doors. I had the Jr Suite - I had doubts about booking this hotel as it was so much cheaper than anything else on Expedia - but I would stay there again in a second.
reviews.title: Great little hotel
Great Staff
reviews.text: It was all very clean - the room was well equiped (stereo, cd player, minibar, etc) with a view over the city. The shower in the bathroom was great - two air con units- one in the bedroom and another in the sitting area.

reviews.title: GOOD DEAL
reviews.text: Breakfast had both european and Vietnamese food. Service was great too - arriving late i had offers to go and get food from nearby restaurants.

This is a decent 3 star hotel. We stayed there for 3 nights and the bed is comfortable, the room clean with a good air conditioner. TV has satellite. There is an adequate bathroom although a bit grimy in places. A good scrubbing is needed.
reviews.title: Nice room - shame about the breakfast

reviews.text: The staff is very helpful. They got us some packing tape to seal up a box we wanted to take on the plane. They put us on a smoking floor even though we requested a non-smoking room, but the room didn't smell of smoke.
reviews.title: Empress Hotel HCMC....

likes.liked: — Exceptionally clean rooms, secure environment, quiet.

reviews.text: The breakfast is really pretty terrible though. They advertise it as a buffet but is actually just some scrambled eggs which were very bland with peas in it, cold toast, butter and jam, two slices of bacon on a plate, a few slices of watermelon and pineapple and that is about it. Forget the breakfast and go out for some Pho. We did after the first morning.
reviews.title: Enjoy

reviews.text: Very very small rooms, but exceptionally clean.
reviews.title: Pleasant surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast buffet is very ordinary / uninspired, but considering the cheap room rates one can't really complain too much!!
reviews.title: Great Experience at Empress

likes.disliked: — Cigarette smoke smell in the room
